author: Jake Romphf
title: B.C. coastal island land being donated for protection - The Abbotsford News
text: After its abundant biodiversity has been stewarded by First Nations for thousands of years and it‚Äôs been eyed for pristine parkland for a century, parts of an island off B.C.‚Äôs Central Coast are closer to being protected forever. At a March 13 ceremony in Victoria, Tula Foundation founders Eric Peterson and Christina Munck announced they would be transferring two parcels, totalling 55 acres, of Calvert Island to the BC Parks Foundation. The land will be incorporated into the island‚Äôs Hakai Luxvbalis Conservancy, which is collaboratively managed by the province and the Heiltsuk and Wuikinuxv First Nations. The founders also announced a donation of $92 million to Tula in support of the organization advancing its scientific innovation. READ MORE: [B.C. couple gives away last $92M, wants others to pick up the baton](https://www.vicnews.com/news/bc-couple-gives-away-last-92m-wants-others-to-pick-up-the-baton-7329547) Peterson called Calvert Island the most iconic place on B.C.‚Äôs coast as it features breathtaking beaches and incredible biodiversity. It‚Äôs also a sacred place for First Nations, he said, noting inhabitants have gathered on the land for over 10,000 years. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs not just any piece of real estate, it‚Äôs an extraordinary place,‚Äù the Tula founder said, highlighting the island‚Äôs complex coastlines carved by glaciation and how it sits among a labyrinth of land and sea along the Central Coast. Those comments were echoed by Andy Day, the BC Parks Foundation‚Äôs CEO, as he touted the incredible stretch of beach and ecology that make up the donated plots. With the site also hosting rich old-growth forests, Day said the Calvert lands are emblematic of the province‚Äôs ecological bounty. Species are under threat around the world, Day said, adding 70 per cent of the world‚Äôs biodiversity has been lost in the last 50 years. Protecting land in perpetuity though actions like the Calvert donation is among the only ways to address that crisis, he said. ‚ÄúAlong with First Nations people and the province of British Columbia, we will make sure that it continues to be managed responsibly for all British Columbians to enjoy and for all the species in that area to enjoy,‚Äù Day said. The CEO hopes the move inspires people to connect with B.C.‚Äôs natural areas and spurs other land donations. The gifted plots have had a complex and fought history, Peterson explained. Archaeological findings show signs of human settlement on the island from 13,000 years ago and around 5,000 years back, it hosted industrial-scale shellfish agriculture with clam gardens, processing areas, drying racks and trading sites. First Nations oral histories recount a settlement known as Luxvbalis that was visited by Captain Vancouver. Luxvbalis was devastated by smallpox epidemic of 1862 and many of the dead were abandoned in one of the island‚Äôs bays. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs many souls from many Nations that have never been properly mourned in this place,‚Äù Peterson said. The donated lands were surveyed after the First World War and a group envisioned it as protected parkland around 1925. The sites welcomed gathering and recreation for the next 40 years as they were effectively used as a park, but were then bought after the protections were never made official, Peterson said. The sites were then logged for their cedar giants before they were taken over in the ‚Äô90s to host a beach resort. That resort created friction with First Nations, other neighbours and BC Parks as the area was closed off from the public. Those tensions escalated in the 2000s under a new U.S. owner who gated the land. Since Tula bought the plots in 2009 and reopened them to the public, Peterson said he‚Äôs thrilled by their current partnership with neighbouring First Nations and he hopes to start conversations with them and all levels of government on transferring a third Calvert property. ‚ÄúThey can be assured now that the future of these two parcels is secured for everyone to enjoy,‚Äù Peterson said. The Tula Foundation‚Äôs Hakai Institute hosts an ecological observatory on Calvert Island that has opened research opportunities to those like Brian Starzomski. He‚Äôs one of the many University of Victoria researchers to study at the facility, and said the chance to work there has been lifechanging for scores of students. ‚ÄúThe most amazing things would happen at this place,‚Äù he said, recounting scientists from diverse disciplines debating the origins of Calvert‚Äôs geography while they dined together at the island. ‚ÄúSo many great research programs and papers came out of these discussions, it‚Äôs one of Eric and Christina‚Äôs great skills, they bring people together and support them with everything they need to do amazing things.‚Äù READ: [Citizen scientist‚Äôs fight for bird habitat access denied](https://www.vicnews.com/local-news/citizen-scientists-fight-for-bird-habitat-access-denied-7329150)

author: Wilson Fl√≥rez
title: ‚ÄúSomos mejores que la liga francesa‚Äù: Cristiano Ronaldo enaltece el f√∫tbol de Arabia Saudita
text:
‚ÄúSomos mejores que la liga francesa‚Äù: Cristiano Ronaldo enaltece el f√∫tbol de Arabia Saudita
El delantero del Al Nassr explic√≥ las razones por las que considera que el f√∫tbol de Arabia Saudita es mejor que la Ligue 1. Cristiano Ronaldo cree que la Saud√≠ Pro League estar√° entre las tres mejores ligas del mundo
Cristiano Ronaldo es el gran estandarte del f√∫tbol de Arabia Saudita. A sus 38 a√±os, el atacante portugu√©s se ha destacado con el Al Nassr de la Saud√≠ Pro League. A pesar de que algunos cuestionen la calidad de aquel torneo, CR7 considera que el f√∫tbol √°rabe es mejor que la Ligue 1 de Francia.
En la previa de la gala de los Globe Soccer Awards, Cristiano Ronaldo fue cuestionado sobre distintos temas relacionados al balompi√©. Entre ellos, el exdelantero del Real Madrid tuvo unas pol√©micas declaraciones sobre el f√∫tbol de la primera divisi√≥n de Francia, torneo que considera inferior a la Saud√≠ Pro League.
‚ÄúPara ser honesto, creo que la liga saud√≠ no es peor que la liga francesa. En la liga francesa tienes dos o tres equipos con buen nivel, en Arabia no. Creo que es m√°s competitiva. Pueden decir lo que quieran, es mi opini√≥n y he jugado all√≠ un a√±o as√≠ que s√© de lo que estoy hablando. Creo que ahora mismo somos mejores que la liga francesa. Seguiremos mejorando‚Äú, explic√≥ el delantero del Al Nassr.
No est√° de m√°s mencionar que en esta liga jug√≥ Lionel Messi, cuando defendi√≥ los colores del Paris Saint-Germain y actualmente sigue derrochando su talento Kylian Mbapp√©, considerado uno de los mejores jugadores del mundo.
Cristiano Ronaldo se mostr√≥ satisfecho con la evoluci√≥n que ha tenido el f√∫tbol √°rabe desde su llegada. Este torneo ha recibido a grandes jugadores tras la incorporaci√≥n del portugu√©s. CR7 considera que paulatinamente ir√°n mejorando su nivel al punto de convertirse en una de las mejores ligas a nivel mundial.
‚ÄúMe siento muy feliz en Al Nassr, es un gran paso. Arabia Saud√≠ est√° en un proceso, llevar√° mucho tiempo‚Ä¶ pero paso a paso llegar√°n al nivel m√°s alto. Creo que la Saudi Pro League estar√° entre las tres mejores ligas del mundo. La gente en Arabia estar√° orgullosa‚Äù, agreg√≥.
Cristiano Ronaldo es inoxidable
Luego de su salida al Manchester United y su prueba en el f√∫tbol √°rabe, Cristiano Ronaldo cerr√≥ un muy buen 2023. Su adaptaci√≥n a la Saud√≠ Pro League fue muy r√°pida al punto de marcar 54 goles y superar los registros de jugadores como Erling Haaland y Kylian Mbapp√©.
‚ÄúFui el m√°ximo goleador de esta temporada, imag√≠nate ganar a animales j√≥venes como Erling Haaland‚Ä¶ Estoy orgulloso. ¬°Y pronto cumplir√© 39 a√±os! Me gusta cuando la gente vuelve a dudar de m√≠ y entonces tengo √©xito. No me afectan las cr√≠ticas‚Äú, concluy√≥.
Sigue leyendo:
‚Äì
El ministro de deportes de Arabia Saudita considera ‚Äúsuperficiales‚Äù las acusaciones de lavado de imagen
‚Äì
Arabia Saudita prepara otra ofensiva contra el f√∫tbol europeo

author: Roger Garc√≠a
title: Ken Salazar destaca cooperaci√≥n ‚Äúhist√≥rica‚Äù bilateral para extradiciones
text:
Nacional El embajador de Estados Unidos en M√©xico, Ken Salazar, durante una rueda de prensa en la Ciudad de M√©xico. Foto de EFE/S√°shenka Guti√©rrez/Archivo Ken Salazar destaca cooperaci√≥n ‚Äúhist√≥rica‚Äù bilateral para extradiciones
El embajador Ken Salazar destac√≥ que este a√±o las extradiciones de M√©xico a EE.UU. representan la cifra m√°s alta en 10 a√±os
diciembre 30, 2023 El embajador de EE.UU. en M√©xico, Ken Salazar , destac√≥ este s√°bado que la cooperaci√≥n ‚Äúhist√≥rica‚Äù en materia de extradiciones entre ambas naciones ‚Äúreafirma el compromiso compartido‚Äù con la seguridad y el bienestar bilateral.
Cooperaci√≥n hist√≥rica en materia de extradiciones reafirma nuestro compromiso compartido con la seguridad y el bienestar de nuestras naciones. https://t.co/IKpwklvWMm pic.twitter.com/I24P2ldBgW
‚Äî Embajador Ken Salazar (@USAmbMex) December 30, 2023
En un comunicado publicado en la red social X (antes Twitter), el diplom√°tico resalt√≥ ‚Äúel alto valor‚Äù de distintas extradiciones a Estados Unidos en los √∫ltimos a√±os, como las de Ovidio Guzm√°n El Rat√≥n , hijo de Joaqu√≠n Chapo Guzm√°n , y de Ismael Quintero ‚Äò Fierro ‚Äò, ‚Äúpor lo que el tratado en materia de extradici√≥n juega un rol crucial para seguir dando estos resultados‚Äù, dijo.
Afirm√≥ que la cooperaci√≥n bilateral ayuda a que enfrenten la ley quienes ponen en riesgo a los pueblos ‚Äúcon el veneno del fentanilo , el tr√°fico de armas o el camino doloroso de la migraci√≥n irregular ‚Äù.
Adem√°s, resalt√≥ que este a√±o Estados Unidos ha deportado a fugitivos a M√©xico buscados por las autoridades por delitos como homicidio, feminicidio, secuestro y crimen organizado.
‚ÄúEl alto n√∫mero de extradiciones a los Estados Unidos y de deportaciones de fugitivos a M√©xico es un claro recordatorio de que rendir√°n cuentas quienes lucran sin escr√∫pulos con la seguridad, la salud y el bienestar de nuestras naciones‚Äù.
Asimismo, dijo que de esta manera se construyen comunidades m√°s seguras para los pueblos en ambos lados de la frontera, pues estas acciones representan ‚Äúgolpes certeros‚Äù contra las organizaciones criminales trasnacionales, los c√°rteles y los polleros (traficantes de personas).
‚ÄúEl Marco Bicentenario y el Di√°logo de Alto Nivel sobre Seguridad nos brindan una base s√≥lida para seguir trabajando juntos para combatir el fentanilo il√≠cito, interrumpir el tr√°fico de armas y manejar la migraci√≥n de manera humana‚Äù, concluy√≥.
El acuerdo de extradici√≥n entre ambos pa√≠ses fue firmado en 1978, si bien las primeras extradiciones comenzaron en 1995.
Con informaci√≥n de EFE

author: El Debate
title: Un club polaco despide a su fichaje estrella por ir a comer al McDonald's y no cuidar su dieta
text: Un club polaco despide a su fichaje estrella por ir a comer al McDonald's y no cuidar su dieta El Rak√≥w Czƒôstochowa decidi√≥ terminar su contrato con el portero noruego Kristoffer Klaesson tan solo 37 d√≠as despu√©s de su fichaje [La sociedad francesa se planta y toma medidas para frenar el ¬´secuestro¬ª del f√∫tbol por parte de las televisiones](https://www.eldebate.com/deportes/futbol/20240829/sociedad-francesa-planta-toma-medidas-frenar-secuestro-futbol-parte-televisiones_223313.html) Actualizada 12:54 Curiosa historia la que llega desde Polonia. El Rak√≥w Czƒôstochowa ha tomado una dr√°stica decisi√≥n con su fichaje estrella del mercado de verano. El guardameta Kristoffer Klaesson, de 23 a√±os, ha sido despedido tan solo 37 d√≠as despu√©s de haber firmado por el club. El motivo: ser visto en el McDonald's por varios aficionados, lo que le hizo entrar con mal pie en el equipo. El futbolista noruego lleg√≥ de la Premier, del Leeds, y su fichaje caus√≥ gran sensaci√≥n. A pesar de no haber tenido apenas oportunidades en el equipo ingl√©s, su experiencia en un gran campeonato hizo al Rak√≥w Czƒôstochowa, uno de los mejores de la liga polaca, fijarse en √©l para reforzar su porter√≠a. Adem√°s, el futbolista lo vio con buenos ojos porque desea hacerse con el puesto de titular en su selecci√≥n. Parec√≠a por tanto el destino ideal para Klaesson, pero las cosas no han salido como deseaba. Nada m√°s llegar, el club tuvo dudas sobre su condici√≥n f√≠sica. El guardameta noruego no estaba en condiciones √≥ptimas para jugar y eso se filtr√≥ a la prensa, lo que sumado a que fue visto por varios aficionados comiendo en el McDonald's hizo que sus d√≠as en el club estuviesen contados. Al parecer, tal y como asegura la prensa polaca, el Rak√≥w Czƒôstochowa exigi√≥ al jugador que redujera su porcentaje de grasa corporal y perdiera unos ocho kilos. Desde el club consideraban esto fundamental para que siguiese en la plantilla, pero a pesar de cumplir el objetivo, han decidido dejarle fuera de la lista de convocados y apartarle del resto del equipo en las sesiones de entrenamiento. El punto de inflexi√≥n Fue precisamente verle en el McDonald's despu√©s de lograr bajar su peso lo que llev√≥ a la directiva del equipo polaco a tomar la decisi√≥n. En opini√≥n del club esto es una falta de profesionalismo y decidi√≥ sancionar a su futbolista. Pocos d√≠as despu√©s llegaron a la conclusi√≥n de que este episodio no ten√≠a marcha atr√°s y ambas partes acordaron rescindir el contrato. ¬´Es evidente que las cosas no salieron como esperaba¬ª, declar√≥ el portero.

author: vivian
title: Argentina Coach Slams Chaotic ‚ÄòCircus‚Äô at Olympic Match vs. Morocco ‚Äì Hollywood Life
text: Argentina‚Äôs time at the 2024 Olympics has not gotten off to a strong start, having dropped their first game in a highly controversial fashion against Morocco on Wednesday. The head of Argentina‚Äôs soccer federation said the chaotic ending to its match ‚Äú[made] no sense,‚Äù and Argentina‚Äôs coach called the scene ‚Äúa scandal.‚Äù ‚ÄúWhat happened on the field was a scandal. This isn‚Äôt a neighborhood tournament, these are the Olympic Games,‚Äù Argentina coach Javier Mascherano said. The opening match of the men‚Äôs soccer tournament was suspended for nearly two hours during added time after Morocco fans invaded the field and threw bottles in protest of a late goal by Argentina. The goal was later overturned after reviewing the play by the video assistant referee, resulting in much confusion and outrage. Officials determined that Cristian Medina, the Argentine goalscorer, had strayed offside, and Argentina lost 2-1. One of the strangest endings you will EVER see. üò≥ Over an hour after Cristian Medina's late equalizer for Argentina against Morocco, the referee announced Medina's goal was disallowed for offside. After playing out the final minutes of the match, Morocco won 2-1. [#ParisOlympics] [pic.twitter.com/PaIhszKyBi] ‚Äî NBC Olympics & Paralympics (@NBCOlympics) [July 24, 2024] ‚ÄúToday they invaded the field seven times and then threw fireworks at us. They told us it ended 2‚Äì2. Even Morocco didn‚Äôt want to play,‚Äù Mascherano continued, speaking on the game‚Äôs controversial finish. Paris organizers said they were trying to ‚Äúunderstand the causes and identify appropriate actions‚Äù after the match in Saint-Etienne. Argentina‚Äôs soccer federation said it had issued a formal protest Wednesday to the world governing body FIFA and would do ‚Äúwhat is necessary‚Äù to guarantee the safety of players. ‚ÄúHaving to wait almost two hours in the dressing room, after Morocco fans entering the pitch, the violence that the Argentina delegation suffered, our players having to warm up again and continue to play a match that should have been suspended by the main referee, is really something that makes no sense and that goes against the competition rules,‚Äù Argentina Football Association president Claudio Tapia said. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs the biggest circus I‚Äôve ever seen in my life,‚Äù Mascherano said. ‚ÄúObviously it‚Äôs confusing, but we have to move forward. It‚Äôs already happened, it‚Äôs over. We have to focus on the two games (remaining). Save up the anger and let it all out in the coming games.‚Äù The match was one of two opening events at the Games. The Olympic opening ceremony will be held on Friday. Javier Mascherano said the Argentina team was robbed while at training on Tuesday at the Olympics. [pic.twitter.com/QT1x2AFMdK] ‚Äî ESPN FC (@ESPNFC) [July 24, 2024] Mascherano also told reporters recently that thieves entered the grounds during Argentina‚Äôs training session and made away with various items from players on the team, specifically the belongings of Thiago Almada. ‚ÄúYesterday they entered our training and robbed us. Thiago Almada was missing a watch, rings, and everything at training at the Olympics. We didn‚Äôt want to say anything after training,‚Äù said Mascherano, via ESPN FC. Mascherano didn‚Äôt provide further detail on the alleged robbery.

author: Khaleel Muhammad
title: Flood: Jigawa Govt unveils prevention, emergency response plans
text: The Jigawa State Government, through the State Emergency Management Agency, SEMA, has allocated N4 billion for flood prevention and emergency response

author: Lusa
title: Sindicato convoca trabalhadores da Volkswagen na Alemanha para a greve
text:
"Se necess√°rio, esta ser√° a batalha de negocia√ß√£o coletiva mais dura que a Volkswagen alguma vez conheceu", alerta o IG Metall num comunicado divulgado no final do per√≠odo de di√°logo social obrigat√≥rio para 120 mil trabalhadores da marca na Alemanha.
Na sexta-feira, o fabricante autom√≥vel alem√£o, que est√° a preparar um forte plano de reestrutura√ß√£o, recusou a contraproposta dos sindicatos para reduzir custos sem ter de encerrar f√°bricas, o que fez aumentar as perspetivas de endurecimento do di√°logo social.
"Estas greves de advert√™ncia ter√£o in√≠cio na segunda-feira em todas as f√°bricas", referiu Thorsten Gr√∂ger, dirigente do IG Metall, citado pela AFP, que considerou os representantes da empresa na mesa de negocia√ß√µes respons√°veis pela "dura√ß√£o e intensidade deste confronto".
Por seu lado, a Volkswagen afirmou, em comunicado, "respeitar" o direto dos trabalhadores de participarem numa "greve de advert√™ncia", referindo que acredita na continua√ß√£o do "di√°logo construtivo" para "alcan√ßar uma solu√ß√£o duradoura e apoiada coletivamente".
A empresa adiantou ainda ter "tomado medidas para garantir o abastecimento de emerg√™ncia" durante esta paralisa√ß√£o, de forma a minimizar "tanto quanto poss√≠vel" o seu impacto nos clientes, parceiros e fabricas.
No final de outubro, a l√≠der da estrutura que representa os trabalhadores da Volkswagen (VW) informou que os planos de gest√£o do grupo envolvem o encerramento de tr√™s f√°bricas na Alemanha, a supress√£o de dezenas de milhares de postos de trabalho e a redu√ß√£o em 10% os sal√°rios dos restantes trabalhadores.
Posteriormente, o fabricante alem√£o indicou em comunicado que "devido √† crise econ√≥mica na ind√∫stria autom√≥vel", n√£o consegue "satisfazer a exig√™ncia do sindicato de um aumento salarial de 7%".
"Em vez disso, a empresa acredita que a redu√ß√£o dos sal√°rios em 10% daria √† Volkswagen AG os meios para fazer investimentos futuros, de modo a manter-se competitiva e, assim, salvaguardar os postos de trabalho", l√™-se na nota de imprensa ent√£o divulgada.
A Volkswagen teve um lucro de 7.590 milh√µes de euros at√© setembro, menos 33,1% face ao per√≠odo hom√≥logo, devido √† queda das vendas na China.
[Not√≠cia atualizada √†s 12h35]
Leia Tamb√©m: [Volkswagen. Plano para fechar f√°bricas na Alemanha n√£o afeta Autoeuropa](https://www.noticiasaominuto.com/economia/2680710/volkswagen-plano-para-fechar-fabricas-na-alemanha-nao-afeta-autoeuropa)
